textSub.name: para1
textSub.string:
Meet Orville, the Orca Whale! You've left the reef
 at last, and reached the vast, open water. It's
 beautiful out here, but deadly too. This is the
 home of the great white shark!

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
You have more room to move out in the open waters.
 If things get a little too crowded near you, try to find
 a safer spot to feed.
